body.name: Microfiber Mop for Floor Cleaning, 18'' Flat Mop with Dust Mop and Wet Mop, Hardwood Floor Mop with 360° Swivel Head and 2 Scrubber, 2 Washable Mop Pads, 1 Scraper, Extendable Handle
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 14 hrs 44 mins
features: 【Dry Dust Mop and Wet Mop】-- Mops for floor cleaning come with dry dust mop pad and wet mop pad. Microfiber dust mop effectively collect dust and hairs. Wet mop Pad mixes twisted yarn and nylon yarn, remove stubborn stains quickly and easily. Both are friendly to any floor, like hardwood, vinyl, linoleum,marble, cement, tile, laminate, and so on.
【Detachable Scrubber】--Diameter 2.6''/6.6cm detachable scrubber hidden at the end of handle, help remove stubborn stains stuck on the floor.

【360° Swivel Head】 -- Helps floor mop reach every corner in house. No need to adjust the mop all the time, you can easily clean table legs, the corner of the wall, the bottom of the sofa and other difficult-to-clean corners.

【Extra Large Mop Head】-- 18x6"(45X15cm) Extra large mop head of dust mop covers larger area, makes cleaning faster and more efficiently. There are four different color tabs to differentiate the purpose of the mop pad (cut off 3, left 1), e.g. for the kitchen only, for bathroom only.

【Adjustable Long Handle】-- The handle of mops for floor cleaning is assembled by 4pcs thickened iron pipes, and outside is anti-rust coating to prevent rust and deformation, making it more durable. You can choose comfortable handle length (57.1''/145cm, 43.5''/110.5cm) according to your needs to avoid low back pain, back pain, shoulder pain.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The flat wet dry mops for floor cleaning Easy to use: Mop for floor cleaning has 360° rotation and telescoping handle, you can easily and quickly mop the floor, even under the furniture.Strength Toughness: To increase the strength and toughness of the plastic, it needs to pass 500 fatigue tests, the mop head is not easy to be broken.Strong Cleanliness: Dry mop head: full polyester coral fleece, wet mop head: 80% polyester + 20% nylon twisted cloth + nylon silk. Different wet and dry cloth heads play different cleaning functions, the cloth head has strong water absorption and strong cleaning power, making it easier and faster to clean the home, and the round scrubber has strong decontamination.Various Types: The Dust Mop ideals for use on all types of surface areas, wood floors, kitchen floors, dining room floors, bathroom floors, tile floors, marble floors, hardwoods, office floors, garages, warehouses, glass windows, and walls. The round scrubber suits for kitchen and bathroom.

The wet and dry mop cleaning cloths use different materials to achieve the best cleaning effect.Both are friendly to any floor, like hardwood, vinyl, linoleum,marble, cement, tile, laminate, etc. Dry Mop Cloths -- Made of high-density microfiber, with strong water absorption capacity and effective dust absorption capacity.Wet Mop Cloths-- Mixes twisted yarn and nylon yarn, to enhance the cleaning ability, remove stubborn stains quickly and easily.

Small Scrubber Concealed Scrubber, diameter 2.6inches, press the button to take out. For cleaning very stubborn stains. Comes with a replacement scrubber pad. Wearable Design Velcro will gradually lose its stickiness after repeated use. So we use wearable mop head design to avoid this problem and prolong the service life of the mop Machine Wash Safe Wet and dry mop cloths are both machine washable and hand washable.

360°Swivel Head Helps floor mop reach every corner in house. No need to adjust the mop all the time, you can easily clean table legs, the corner of the wall, the bottom of the sofa and other difficult-to-clean corners. Extra Large Mop Head 17.7x5.9"(45X15cm) Extra large mop head covers larger area, makes cleaning faster and more efficiently. Save your time on cleaning, get more time for family Color Tabs There are four different color tabs to differentiate the purpose of each mop cloths. Cut off 3 then left 1 for mark. Such as red for kitchen, blue for bathroom.
Spray Mop Window Squeegee Shower Scrubber Shower Scrubber Floor Scrubber Feature Spray Trigger Long Handle Quick Clean Two Head 3-in-1

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not worth it
reviews.reviewText: The handle kept coming un screwed, the " spot cleaner " would flip over and roll around. The mop itself didn't pick up much. Not impressed
